price: 70. Ama Yallal dirab ginnaasite mari addunyâ bagul edde yanin koroosannut dago hatkiyyah hatke-lon, tohuk wadir usun rabeeniik lakal nee fan gacan, sarra akeeral girâ digaalay gibdi ken tammoysenno Yallal koroositeenih sugeenimî sabbatah.
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ نُذِيقُهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلشَّدِيدَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: matāʿun fī al-dun'yā thumma ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma nudhīquhumu al-ʿadhāba al-shadīda bimā kānū yakfurūna
